TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetNamedPipeBinding extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences
Public Class NetNamedPipeBinding Inherits Binding Implements IBindingRuntimePreferences
type NetNamedPipeBinding = class inherit Binding interface IBindingRuntimePreferences

summary.span: 提供一个既安全又可靠且针对计算机上的通信进行了优化的绑定。

span.span: Provides a secure and reliable binding that is optimized for on-machine communication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 会生成一个运行时通信堆栈，该堆栈可使用传输安全、用于消息传递的命名管道和二进制消息编码。The generates a run-time communication stack by default, which uses transport security, named pipes for message delivery, and a binary message encoding. 此绑定是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 系统提供的一个相应选项，可用于计算机上的通信。This binding is an appropriate Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) system-provided choice for on-machine communication. 它还支持事务。It also supports transactions. 的默认配置与 所提供的配置类似，但要简单一些，因为 WCF 实现仅计划在计算机上使用，因此公开的功能就更少。The default configuration for the is similar to the configuration provided by the , but it is simpler because the WCF implementation is only meant for on-machine use and consequently there are fewer exposed features. 其中最显著的差异在于 设置只提供 和 选项。The most notable difference is that the setting only offers the and options. 不包括 SOAP 安全支持选项。SOAP security support is not an included option. 安全行为可通过在 `securityMode` 构造函数中使用可选的 参数进行配置。The security behavior is configurable using the optional `securityMode` parameter in the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例显示配置文件的一部分，其中包含值设置为默认值的 的节。The following example shows the part of the configuration file that contains the section for the with values set to defaults. 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式使用 类。The following example shows how to programmatically use the class. [!code-csharp[S_UENetNamedPipe#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetnamedpipe/cs/service.cs#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全行为可通过在构造函数中使用可选的 `securityMode` 参数进行配置。The security behavior is configurable using the optional `securityMode` parameter in the constructor.

summary.span: 获取或设置内存中用于对传入消息进行缓冲的最大字节数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.

value.span: 内存中用于对传入消息进行缓冲的最大字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory.

value.span: 默认值为 524,288 字节。

span.span: The default value is 524,288 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果接收的数据超过了可进行缓冲处理的数据，则超出缓冲区大小的数据将保留在基础套接字中，直到缓冲区中具有可用于存储剩余数据的空间为止。If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 值。The following example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[S_UENetNamedPipe#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetnamedpipe/cs/service.cs#5)]

value.span: 默认值为 65,536 字节。

span.span: The default value is 65,536 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果接收的数据超过了可进行缓冲处理的数据，则超出缓冲区大小的数据将保留在基础套接字中，直到缓冲区中具有可用于存储剩余数据的空间为止。If you receive more data than you can buffer, the data that exceeds the buffer size remains on the underlying socket until your buffer has room for the rest of the data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 值。The following example shows how to get the value. summary.span: 获取或设置入站和出站的最大连接数，这些连接是配置了命名管道绑定的终结点所允许的。

span.span: The maximum number of named pipe connections that are allowed with this binding.

value.span: 默认值为 10。

span.span: The default value is 10.

summary.span: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定的终结点处理的 SOAP 消息的复杂性约束。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.

value.span: 为交换的 SOAP 消息指定复杂性约束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.

value.span: 下面的备注部分中提供了这些约束的默认值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表达这些约束及其默认值的属性如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384 ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 对象。The following example shows how to get the object. [!code-csharp[S_UENetNamedPipe#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenetnamedpipe/cs/service.cs#11)]

span.span: The value set is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示采用此绑定配置的服务是使用消息传输的流处理模式（单向或双向），还是缓冲模式。

value.span: 值，该值指示通过此绑定配置的服务是使用消息传输的流处理模式（单向或双向）还是缓冲模式。

span.span: The value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed (in one or both directions) or buffered modes of message transfer.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过分别指定 或 ，可以仅对传入或传出消息进行流处理。It is possible to stream only the incoming or the outgoing messages by specifying, respectively, or . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 。The following example shows how to get the .
